Create a unique bread loaf by adding different herbs and spices to the dough, such as rosemary, thyme, garlic, and black pepper. Serve it with a side of roasted vegetables and a creamy goat cheese spread.
Make a gluten-free bread loaf by using almond flour, coconut flour, and flaxseed meal as the base. Add a dollop of fresh berries or sliced banana to the top of the loaf before baking.
Make a savory bread loaf by adding diced ham, Swiss cheese, and spinach to the dough. Serve it with a creamy avocado spread and a side of tomato soup.
Make a sweet bread loaf by adding cinnamon, nutmeg, and raisins to the dough. Serve it with a scoop of vanilla ice cream orstrudel.
Make a sourdough bread loaf by using a natural sourdough starter instead of commercial yeast. Serve it with a side of hummus and roasted vegetables.
